titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of April 2019 as "National Donate Life Month".
A resolution supporting the designation of April 2019 as "National Donate Life Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Organ and tissue donation and transplantation

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of April 2019 as National Donate Life Month and for promoting awareness of organ and tissue donation.
